name: Slime Showdown (LD50)
description:
The boss slime is chasing you down! Defeat his minions to power up until you can fight back.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50th edition by Theo Cremers, Ruud Cremers and Laurens de Vos.

The controls are:

WASD/arrow keys to move.
Left mousebutton to fire a ranged attack.
Right mousebutton to attack with a melee swipe.
Spacebar to pause the game.
1 / 2 to toggle fullscreen or windowed.
